moreover, child actors are vulnerable to online bullying, trolling, and harassment from the public and the media. the paparazzi might stalk them and invade their privacy to get a story, which can be emotionally distressing for the child and their families.

in conclusion, while there may not be any recent controversy surrounding child actors in the media, the potential for such incidents to occur is high. it is crucial to ensure that children are protected and kept away from harmful situations involving the media. parents and professionals in the industry must be vigilant and take extra measures to protect the well-being of child actors.
